item.title: public key disclosure
item.description: public key disclosure Very often keys are pushed to code repositories such as Github, Bitbucket or Gitlab. You want to identify a target code repo and search all commit history to discover secrets that might have been pushed. Tools to search git repos gitleaks # MOVE TO OWN TOOLS PAGE gitrob # MOVE TO OWN TOOLS PAGE truffleHog # MOVE TO OWN TOOLS PAGE Example docker pull zricethezav/gitleaks docker run --rm --name=gitleaks zricethezav/gitleaks -v -r https://github.
